featured.text: It has long been assumed that creativity is some unusual trait enjoyed by the few.
Added to this early training is a physical trait shared by people there－disproportionately long legs, which is advantageous for distance runners.
Such dimples are not a permanent trait, for they vanish when the excessive fat goes away.
For US $60, a recently-founded company called Dognition will help you learn more about your dog’s cognitive traits.

other.text: If neither of the parents has dimple genes, their children will not 35 the trait.
Critics of the country say that drinking is almost an inherent trait of the Russian people.

definition.en_def: A distinguishing characteristic or quality, especially of one's personal nature.
definition.example: Honesty is a valuable trait in a friend.
